Package org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.ejb

Class Summary
DDCreator Build a serialised deployment descriptor given a text file description of the descriptor in the format supported by WebLogic.
DDCreatorHelper A helper class which performs the actual work of the ddcreator task.
Ejbc Build EJB support classes using Weblogic's ejbc tool from a directory containing a set of deployment descriptors.
EjbcHelper A helper class which performs the actual work of the ejbc task.
EjbJar Provides automated ejb jar file creation for ant.
WLRun Execute a Weblogic server.
WLStop Shutdown a Weblogic server.
